sentences.en: Below eave of inn of dragon a hanger - on of an aristocrat much a body.
sentences.cn: 龙门客栈屋檐下又多了一具尸体.

sentences.en: Can't you see he just wants to play the aristocrat?
sentences.cn: 你看不出他就是想扮出一副贵族派头 吗 ?

sentences.en: Defeat your enemies and rise to the position of aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 打败你的敌人,提升你在王室里的爵位.

sentences.en: Fight off the pirates. Maintain your settlement at aristocrat Level.
sentences.cn: 与海盗战斗. 维护您的殖民地在贵族水平.

sentences.en: For ancient times aristocrat daily necessities.
Further up, I ran into a man dressed like an aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 我继续往上走, 遇到了一位穿戴类似贵族的男人.

sentences.en: He entered the cell and presented the letter to the aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 他走进牢房把信交给贵族.

sentences.en: He is by pedigree an aristocrat.
He tried to behave. like an aristocrat in order to win the heart of the girl.
sentences.cn: 为了赢得姑娘的心,他尽量表现得像个贵族.

sentences.en: The aristocrat clings to the glory of his past.
sentences.cn: 那个贵族执著于他过去的荣耀.

sentences.en: The curtain went up on the final act of the play and revealed the aristocrat sitting alone behind bars in his dark cell.
sentences.cn: 这出戏的最后一场的帷幕升起来了,展现在观众面前的是那位贵族,他孤独地坐在铁栏后的那间黑暗的号房里.

sentences.en: The harried magazinist appeared as the tragic young aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 给杂志写稿的潦倒文人,成了悲剧性的年轻贵族.

sentences.en: This unfortunate aristocrat girl Penelope becomes this ancient curse fall guy.
sentences.cn: 这个不幸的贵族女孩佩内洛普成为这个古老诅咒的牺牲者.

sentences.en: To win ANNO 1701 you have to defeat your opponents or be promoted to an aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 为了赢你必须打败你的对手或晋升为贵族.

sentences.en: Warrington remarked with a pleased surprise the splendid toilet of this scented and shiny - booted young aristocrat.
sentences.cn: 沃林顿惊喜地评价了这个满身香水味、皮鞋擦得贼亮的青年贵族的华丽服饰.

words.tran_cn: 贵族的；贵族政治的；有贵族气派的
贵族；贵族统治；上层社会；贵族政治

trans.tran_en: someone who belongs to the highest social class
